Description.Name: Repaired Power Conduits
Description.Details: The Argo's power system is a wreck, and getting a minimal level of power to the ship's systems without constant tripped breakers and brownouts is a minor miracle.

AssignedCastDescription: I'm terrified of the current state of the power system, Commander. Repairing it should be a top priority. We cannot bring most of the Argo's other systems online until the power is stable. Alsoâ€¦ I'd avoid touching any exposed deck plating. Just in case.
